PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-16532012-12-11,  ,  ,  ,  ,  AAFC
ActFarm Income Protection Act
SubjectGrants to assist livestock producers in Ontario
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food to provide for FEDERAL GRANTS OF UP TO $1, 500,000 TO ASSIST LIVESTOCK PRODUCERS IN ONTARIO who have been affected by severe drought with the additional costs of transporting feed and animals in order to help them access the forage and feed required to maintain their breeding animals over the winter of 2012-13.
AttachmentsAttachment
